artist: Artist: Nicolas Africano; Publisher: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: from a suite of 13 color lithographs housed in a beige linen portfolio box, titled by hand individually by the artist, with an acrylic sumi ink wash; man with baggy pants dragging a large log-like object; round brimmed hat
inscription: Signature, Title, Date, Chop, and Edition
markings: LR: VEL chop mark; see also \"signed\" field
signed: Lower margin in pencil: [A.P. 5/5 Nicolas/ Africano 1990]; at top in grey: [March 1988/He tried to carry something too large./He felt like he was falling.]
title: March 1988 - He Tried to Carry Something Too Large, He Felt Like He Was Falling, from "Lilacs and Smoke"
